TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TargetCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of all [Target](../Topic/Target%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) elements in a project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target AddNewTarget(string targetName) cil managed

Docs.param: The `Name` attribute of the new `Target` element.
Docs.summary: Adds a new [Target](../Topic/Target%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element to the end of the project.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"> object representing the created `Target` element.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array array, int index);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.param: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection>. The <xref:System.Array> must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in at which copying begins.
Docs.summary: Copies the entire <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
Gets a value indicating the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection>.
Docs.value: An integer value representing the number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"> objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target> object in the collection represents a element in the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Exists(string targetName) cil managed

Docs.param: The `Name` attribute of the Target element to search for.
Docs.summary: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"> exists in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../../../../../add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection>.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> is synchronized (thread safe).
Docs.value: `true` if access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection"> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`. The default is `false`.

Docs.param: The `Name` attribute of the Target element in the collection.
Docs.summary: Gets the specified <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"> object in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection>.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target"> object that contains the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target.Name%2A> property value specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target> object represents a `Target` element in the project.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveTarget(class Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Target targetToRemove) cil managed

Docs.param: The `Name` attribute of the `Target` element to remove.
Docs.summary: Removes the specified [Target](../Topic/Target%20Element%20\(MSBuild\).md) element from the project.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection">.
Docs.value: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.TargetCollection">.
